revised_title: Hygrometrical Observations on Board His Majesty's Surveying Vessel Etna
tldr: This paper presents hygrometrical observations made on board the surveying vessel Etna from March 27 to July 6, 1834. The observations include the height of the barometer, dew point, degrees of dryness and moisture, vapor elasticity, and vapor content. A second series also shows the progress of solar radiation.
